feeds.source: The Record from Recorded Future News

items.title: Russian kids revolt as Kremlin bans Roblox, other popular apps
items.summary: The ban on Roblox has drawn a sharp backlash from the platform’s roughly 18 million monthly Russian users — mostly children and teenagers — who have launched social-media campaigns and video petitions urging officials to restore access.

items.title: Researchers track dozens of organizations affected by React2Shell compromises tied to China’s MSS
items.summary: Researchers have confirmed more than 30 affected organizations tied to the React2Shell bug that emerged last week.

items.title: Three hacking groups, two vulnerabilities and all eyes on China
items.summary: What does it mean that three separate China-linked groups all moved on the same SharePoint vulnerabilities at nearly the same time?

items.title: Russian police bust bank-account hacking gang that used NFCGate-based malware
items.summary: Russian police said they took down a multimillion-dollar cybercrime operation that used malware based on a legitimate software tool to take over individuals' bank accounts.

items.title: UK intelligence warns AI 'prompt injection' attacks might never go away
items.summary: A top technologist at the U.K.’s National Cyber Security Centre said “there’s a good chance” that prompt injection attacks against AI will never be eliminated, and he warned of the related risks of embedding generative AI into digital systems globally.
